client_profile: Family looking to buy in Brussels, budget 830000–1305000 EUR. Priorities include residential and quiet areas, premium feel, and childcare access.
nice_to_have: Access to local cafes and brunch spots
contradictions: Desire for quiet yet vibrant neighborhoods
Access to amenities vs. quiet living
questions_for_agent_landlord: What is the average time on the market for properties in this area?
Are there any upcoming developments that might affect property prices?
How often do properties become available in our budget range?
What utilities and maintenance costs can we expect?
Are there any neighborhood associations or restrictions we should know about?

top_districts.name: Uccle

microhoods.name: Foret de Soignes
microhoods.why: Offers extensive green spaces and playgrounds ideal for families.
microhoods.watch_out: Commute can be slower without a car.

microhoods.name: Vivier D’oie
microhoods.why: Has a family-friendly atmosphere and easy access to parks.
microhoods.watch_out: Budget stretch possible in prime areas.

why: Residential vibe attracts families seeking quiet living.
Excellent childcare facilities and schools nearby.
watch_out: Commute can be slower without a car.

top_districts.name: Woluwe-Saint-Lambert

microhoods.name: Kapelleveld
microhoods.why: Greener area with lively family-friendly parks and amenities.
microhoods.watch_out: Prices can be above average, especially in popular areas.

microhoods.name: Val D’or
microhoods.why: Offers good transit access and proximity to major amenities.
microhoods.watch_out: Fast rentals may limit options within budget.

why: Well-known for family-oriented neighborhoods and parks.
Strong schools and childcare facilities available.
watch_out: Prices can be above average, especially in popular areas.

top_districts.name: Woluwe-Saint-Pierre

microhoods.name: Saint - Paul
microhoods.why: Offers a peaceful environment with good amenities.

why: Blend of residential comfort and accessibility.
Good mix of parks and local shops.
watch_out: Higher price range for larger homes.
